snippet: Madagascar’s exiled former leader, Marc Ravalomanana, was detained Monday after returning to the country for the first time since he was deposed in a coup in 2009.
lead_paragraph: Madagascar’s exiled former leader, Marc Ravalomanana, was detained Monday after returning to the country for the first time since he was deposed in a coup in 2009.

headline.main: Madagascar: Ex-Leader Detained After a Homecoming
